config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _journalDiskSync configuration option is used in the code to determine whether to enable disk synchronization for the journal. If _transientMode is false, a PersistentJournal is created with the specified _journalDiskSync value.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _journalDiskSync configuration depends on the usage of the journal. If the journal is frequently written to, the disk synchronization will be triggered more often.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _journalDiskSync configuration option on the system is related to the performance and durability of the journal. Enabling disk synchronization can ensure data consistency but may also introduce overhead in terms of disk writes.
